conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway with clear wall geometry and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect 3D transformation with consistent wall thickness and clean cutaway logic.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout. Added a partition wall between dining and living areas not explicitly defined in the floor plan, though it follows the label separation.

interior_elements.notes: All major elements (kitchen, stairs, bathroom fixtures, dining, sofa) are present and correctly placed.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean, professional rendering; minimal deducltion for slight simplification of stair railing.

detected_errors.description: Unplanned internal wall added to separate living and dining rooms.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that accurately translates the 2D floor plan into a logical and aesthetically clean isometric model.
